local_intent: Lower gently until contact at 10 threshold and verify contact; retry up to three times.
assumptions: End-effector is above the table near the block
Safe to perform a short vertical approach
coherence_with_global: Respects global plan around LowerUntilContact: checks visibility, re-aligns, sets yaw to 0, performs LowerUntilContact with slow/0.02/10/1200, then verifies via ContactDetected; Retry models recovery if contact not detected.
